topic.title: Preparing for Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Integration

body.p: Perform the following configuration steps before using Oracle VM VirtualBox to integrate with your Oracle Cloud Infrastructure account.

li.p: Install the Extension Pack. Cloud integration features are only available when you install the Oracle VM VirtualBox Extension Pack. See .
Create a key pair. Generate an API signing key pair that is used for API requests to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure. See .
Upload the public key of the key pair from your client device to the cloud service. See .
Create a cloud profile. The cloud profile contains resource identifiers for your cloud account, such as your user OCID, and details of your key pair. See .
